p: For RVC (Fig. 6), the nucleotide identities with the sequences available in GenBank ranged between 83 and 91%. The most common genotype was G6P [ 5] (8 samples), while the remaining 3 genomes would present two new RVC VP7 genotypes in combination with P [ 4] – one with GX1P [ 4] and one with GX2P [ 4] – and one GX2P [ 5].
